description.text: Your critical hit from a spell or spell-like ability aff licts the target with a major spellblight.

sections.Benefit: Whenever you confirm a critical hit with a touch spell, ranged touch spell, or spell-like ability against an opponent, the victim gains a random major spellblight (see page 96).
sections.Special: You can only apply the effects of one critical feat to a given critical hit unless you possess Critical Mastery.
